## RemirrorProps.usesBuiltInExtensions property

Determines whether or not to use the built in extensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
usesBuiltInExtensions: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Use this if you would like to take full control of all your extensions and have some understanding of the underlying Prosemirror internals.

```ts
const builtInExtensions = [new DocExtension(), new TextExtension(), new ParagraphExtension()]

```
